posts.post_content:
Posted By: Patrick Helfrick
Hello. I am new to the forum and thought I would see if anyone had any items such as photographs or autographs of Walter "Peck" Lerian. Walt was a catcher for the Philadelphia Phillies in 1928 & '29 who was tragically killed in a freak accident in the fall of '29. Thanks in advance for any help!

Patrick

Posted By: Anthony S.
Hi Patrick,

You may want to post this to the 20's - 40's BST forum (Lerian passed away in 1929, you said) as there are many niche collectors who only collect particular sets or years who could possibly help you but may not see this post in the 19th century forum.
